argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_coscl | |- ( A e. CC -> ( cos ` A ) e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | #P_coscl | |- ( B e. CC -> ( cos ` B ) e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | #P_mulcl | |- ( ( ( cos ` A ) e. CC /\ ( cos ` B ) e. CC ) -> ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) e. CC ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) e. CC ) |
| 5 |  | #P_2cnne0 | |- ( 2 e. CC /\ 2 =/= 0 ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( 2 e. CC /\ 2 =/= 0 ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_3anass | |- ( ( ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) e. CC /\ 2 e. CC /\ 2 =/= 0 ) <-> ( ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) e. CC /\ ( 2 e. CC /\ 2 =/= 0 ) ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 6, 7 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) e. CC /\ 2 e. CC /\ 2 =/= 0 ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_divcan3 | |- ( ( ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) e. CC /\ 2 e. CC /\ 2 =/= 0 ) -> ( ( 2 x. ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) ) / 2 ) = ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( ( 2 x. ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) ) / 2 ) = ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_sincl | |- ( A e. CC -> ( sin ` A ) e. CC ) |
| 12 |  | #P_sincl | |- ( B e. CC -> ( sin ` B ) e. CC ) |
| 13 |  | #P_mulcl | |- ( ( ( sin ` A ) e. CC /\ ( sin ` B ) e. CC ) -> ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( sin ` B ) ) e. CC ) |
| 14 | 11, 12, 13 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( sin ` B ) ) e. CC ) |
| 15 | 4, 14, 4 | #P_ppncand | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( ( ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) + ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( sin ` B ) ) ) + ( ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) - ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( sin ` B ) ) ) ) = ( ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) + ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_cossub | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( cos ` ( A - B ) ) = ( ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) + ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( sin ` B ) ) ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_cosadd | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( cos ` ( A + B ) ) = ( ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) - ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( sin ` B ) ) ) ) |
| 18 | 16, 17 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( ( cos ` ( A - B ) ) + ( cos ` ( A + B ) ) ) = ( ( ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) + ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( sin ` B ) ) ) + ( ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) - ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( sin ` B ) ) ) ) ) |
| 19 | 4 | #P_2timesd | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( 2 x. ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) ) = ( ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) + ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) ) ) |
| 20 | 15, 18, 19 | #P_3eqtr4rd | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( 2 x. ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) ) = ( ( cos ` ( A - B ) ) + ( cos ` ( A + B ) ) ) ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( ( 2 x. ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) ) / 2 ) = ( ( ( cos ` ( A - B ) ) + ( cos ` ( A + B ) ) ) / 2 ) ) |
| 22 | 10, 21 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) = ( ( ( cos ` ( A - B ) ) + ( cos ` ( A + B ) ) ) / 2 ) ) |
